page.title: 07FENCE MILL
page.content: 1884 Fence Mill was built.It is the biggest building in Fence.It was a cotton mill.The fabric was made by spinning the cotton here and then it was also woven here. With times changing and more goods being imported about 15 years ago the mill closed down .Every single worker there was put out of work. The cottages around the mill were built by the mill owners and rented out to the workers.Over the years the workers were allowed to buy the cottages cheaply if they had worked there for a long time.In 1980 mill reopened containing two separate industries.The mill lodge was filled with enormous goldfish.But now it has been drained out.
